actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution to require the Attorney General of the United States to conduct an investigation to determine whether antitrust violations are occurring in the manufacture or marketing of replacement home canning lids.

summary.text: Requires the Attorney General of the United States to conduct an investigation to determine whether antitrust violations are occurring in the manufacture or marketing of replacement home canning lids, and for other purposes. Directs the Attorney General to submit a report to the Congress no later than sixty days after the date of evactment of this joint resolution detailing his findings, proposed action and recommendations concerning legislation. Calls for a final report no later than one year after evactment of this joint resolution detailing actions taken by the Attorney General against any person violating the Antitrust Acts in regard to the manufacture or marketing of such lids.

titles.title: A joint resolution to require the Attorney General of the United States to conduct an investigation to determine whether antitrust violations are occurring in the manufacture or marketing of replacement home canning lids.
